comments:
Changes introduced to fix Bug 11308 cause the following exception to occur when
the new code is run against an existing workspace. The new code doesn't have to
be compatible with the old code (it doesn't have to convert the old metadata),
but we need to deal with invalid metadata better.

If we try to load a config and the metadata is invalid, we should silently
delete the config.
